translation.Message_0_Page_0: Penguins migrate to the south in the early spring.
translation.Message_0_Page_1: I've attached a tracking device to one of them white ones...
translation.Message_0_Page_2: And discovered a super secret radar station!
translation.Message_0_Page_3: Tell me, why would penguins disappear for 6 months just to operate a radio tower?
translation.Message_0_Page_4: We must do it, <color=#64c819>Blow up the Radio Tower</color>.
